analyzed: mañjuśrī stotram
dhyāna adhipa ucita virājita saumya rūpaḥ
vandāmahe sura nara asura vandita āryam
bāla ākṛtiḥ kuvalaya ujjvala lola hastaḥ
keyūra hāra maṇi kuṇḍala ghṛṣṭa gaṇḍaḥ
khādan ca ṣoḍaśa aradam su kumāra rūpam
vandāmahe sura vara arcita mañjughoṣam
roma agra kūpa vivare parivartamānam
viśva prapañca karaṇam sugata ātmajasya
traividya mantra tava nātha guṇa arṇaveṇa
sūkṣmāya buddha tanayāya namaḥ astu tasmai
gambhīra dharma naya mārga sukha pratiṣṭham
jñāna udadhim nikhila sattva kṛtārtha kāram
prajñā nidhāna guṇa sāgaram aprameyam
mañjuśriyam jina sutam satatam namāmi
vidita sakala tattvaḥ kṣipta santāpa sattva
upakārī sarva duḥkha apahārī
madana mathana vīraḥ cāru rūpaḥ su cīra
pātu mām mañjughoṣaḥ  /
bāla indu rucira ābhāsam vara ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
prajñā abja amala pattra akṣam vande mañjuśriyam sadā
pātram vāma kare yasya bhraman añjali saṃnibham
nāmnā te sarvatas lakṣmīḥ mañjughoṣam namāmi aham
khaḍga pustaka hastāya candra maṇḍala vartine
ajñāna dhvānta sūryāya mañjughoṣāya te namaḥ  /
jñāna uttara prabhā ketum praṇidhāna matim tathā
śānta indriyam mañjughoṣam bhaktitaḥ praṇamāmi aham
śrī mañjuśrī stava stotram samāptam
